column1: '''J.W. Braun''' (born [[1975]]<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/J.-W.-Braun/e/B002VXYUKK/ref=ntt_athr_dp_pel_1 J. W. Braun] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 31 August 2011)</ref>) is an American writer. He is the author of ''[[The Lord of the Films]]'' and has contributed to the ''[[The Lord of the Rings Fan Club]]'' magazines.<ref>"[http://jwbraun.com/?p=1 The Author]" at [http://jwbraun.com/ JWBraun.com] (accessed 31 August 2011)</ref>
